title: Text to speech conversion web application
description: Web application that implements Google API to convert written text to downloadable mp3 audio. Users can select language, voice, pitch, speed, and use SSML for advanced control. Includes subscription-based feature limits and statistics panel.
tech: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, PHP, Yii, MySQL

title: Dating Site Store Integration
description: Web app to sell products on an existing dating site. Includes QR code generation and redemption, merchant upload panel, and admin tools. Built with full stack PHP/Yii.
tech: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, PHP, Yii, MySQL

title: 3D Model Rendering Platform
description: Web app for 3D rendering of AutoCAD models using Autodesk SDK. Features include logo overlays, subscription plans, user/admin panels, and share functionality.
tech: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, MySQL, Autodesk PHP SDK, PayPal

title: Stripe Integration (Connected Accounts)
description: Connected Stripe accounts for vendors to sell products on a central platform. Admin can collect a platform fee. Uses Stripe PHP SDK.

title: Zammad Ticket Automation
description: Workflow automation using Zammad API and PHP scripts with web scraping. System processes and updates Zammad tickets with scraped and processed data.

title: Flight Data Visualization
description: Interactive 3D globe visualizing flight data using React, ThreeJS, and Flightlab API. Includes WebSocket chat and Google Places integration.
tech: React, ThreeJS, Node.js, Express, WebSockets, Google Places, Flightlab API

title: Interactive Multimedia Show Editor
description: Multimedia editor to control displays, live streams, games and audio via smartphones. Built using Node.js, Socket.io, and OSC messages. Similar to a live Photoshop-like layer editor.
tech: Node.js, Express, Socket.io, OSC, HTML, CSS, JS

title: Advent Calendar Game
description: Interactive game platform for kids learning English. Includes audio, drag and drop, crosswords, and progress tracking.
tech: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, PHP, MySQL

title: Alphabet Game for Kids
description: Educational game sold via Shopify, connected via API. Features include HTML emails, login/register system, and interactive games for children.
tech: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, PHP, MySQL, Shopify API
